column1: Art Institute of Chicago////What can I say that hasn't been said? The art collection is breathtaking... it's funny because when I lived in Chicago I never visited but now whenever I am in town it's on the top of the list. You can spend days exploring all of the art here and it's a total trip to see paintings you grew up seeing your entire life like American Gothic in person and close up! We had lunch at the restaurant
column3: can recommend it and if you like art I also recommend stopping by the Chicago MCA
